Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Hands down, one of the best pizzas I ever had! All in all a very nice evening. They actually did not have a free table outside, but went out of their way to carry an extra one out for us - thanks a lot! :)

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text:
This experience was Amazing... Beautiful flavours in every meal.
I recommend Primavera Pizza, full of color and great taste, all ingredients were fresh, big pizza for good price... Enjoy their pasta too, is incredible the ingredients they use preparing their delicious meal.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Great cosy italian restaurant on the cosiest street in Amsterdam. This restaurant is a must, very popular so make a reservation otherwise you might have to wait a while for a table. But it's worth the waiting. Great food and service. A place where the locals go to.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Good GF pizza, terrific tiramisu. Too bad for the very long wait to get our pizzas (1h15). The welcome could be more friendly‚Ä¶

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Best place nowadays for lunch or an early dinner. Daily specials, fish/meat/veggie and of course a great pizza, pasta menu. Tiramisu and scroppino to wrap it up!

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: The best meal we had in Amsterdam. Very tender ossobucco, pasta done al dente, and a very interesting dessert - Sgroppino.  (Lemon sorbet, vodka, and spumante in a narrow sundae glass. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: This was exactly what we were after. Somewhere warm and cosy that sold wheat free pizza. The pizza wasn‚Äôt incredibly but it hit the spot! Very friendly staff and got the best seat next to the window. Had the most amazing Italian wine as well. Would definitely go back!

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Great food in a great atmosphere. The pizza with Truffel oil is a must try.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Absolutely delicious choice of food, great atmosphere and attentive service! They also serve gluten-free dishes which made me even more happy and satisfied!

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Cosy corner location with a romantic feel. The pasta regano was delicious. Staff were friendly and attentive. Thought it was quite pricey though I still recommend.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Service was non existent. The servers pretty much slammed plates on the table. Forgot asparagus for us. Then just brought it out during dessert time..one of the weirdest experience I have had in a while. Food was not that great either.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Tried once. Kind service and good wine selection, but that's it - dining is unfortunately an inauthentic and disappointing/average experience, and also over-priced. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Fake Italian place that caters to the local palate. Stereotypical flavour combinations. Overpriced and underwhelming. Linguini alle vongole was pasta from a packet, still stuck together from careless preparation. For authentic Neapolitan pizza, walk 5 mins to Nnea - a place run by actual Italians who aren‚Äôt motivated by profit.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Sweet people, very decent food. Especially if you have gluten free people in your party, they even serve gluten free pasta upon request.  Their service can be spotty, but that's mostly due to lack of staff than anything else. At had a great lunch here.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Pizza tasted good, the people were nice, wine was great... but I don‚Äôt recommend it to people with celiac disease. Somehow they manage to contaminated it even if they offer gluten free pizza baked separately from the others and because of that I spend the evening at the apartment.

Name: De Italiaan

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: I like this little spot, a little buzzing area hidden away. The pizza's were good quality, if a little overpriced. Our waitress was very friendly and helpful. Great to see the gluten free options too.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Took 1 hour to get our entrees while other tables got their food and left.  No excuse!  Then they claimed the dishes we ordered take longer- Wrong - cheese pizza and a simple pasta dish. Never said sorry.  Rude to us on way out too for asking about the delay.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Pizza is decent, but the pasta.. yikes! Lamb ragu so fatty it sits on you for days. Even messed up their arrabbiata with a rogue dollop of green pesto & a *freezing* old mozzarella ball!? Weird combos.

Name: De Italiaan
Review Text: Ordered two pizzas to go: the Parmigiana and the Boscaiola which were both delicious. Would definitely recommend and will definitely order again soon!

Review Text: Nice cozy location with fantastic italian-style pizzas. Quite romantic spot by the candle light - and one tip: book in advance!! It becomes quite popular for dinner. ‚Ä¶
